ygData.subject: Re: Qtn about Quest item
ygData.msgSnippet: Its part of a quest in Rivervale speak to an Druid NPC named Llscent Tagglefoot by the druids guild.  He will say he needs somone to deliver a case of jumjum
ygData.messageBody:
Its part of a quest in Rivervale speak to an Druid NPC named Llscent
Tagglefoot by the druids guild. He will say he needs somone to deliver a
case of jumjum juice to Xanuusus a treant in the Northern Karanas Plains.

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: Su-chan [mailto:chuguet@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 9:22 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Qtn about Quest item


From: "Su-chan" <chuguet@...>

Hi all.-

I've got a Case of Jumjum Juice and I would know where can I get the quest
it is from. I found it in East Commonlands.

Thanks in advance.

Daryoon
Level 6 Bard
Erollisi Marr

Su-chan :)
